result.markdown:
--- title: typecast --- ## Atomic and List Type Casting With Names and Dimensions Preserved {.unnumbered} ### Description Type casting usually strips away attributes of objects.
The functions provided here preserve dimensions, dimnames, and names, which may be more convenient for arrays and array-like objects.

The functions are as follows:
  • as_bool(): converts object to atomic type logical (TRUE, FALSE, NA).
  • as_int(): converts object to atomic type integer.
  • as_dbl(): converts object to atomic type double (AKA numeric).
  • as_chr(): converts object to atomic type character.
  • as_cplx(): converts object to atomic type complex.
  • as_raw(): converts object to atomic type raw.
  • as_list(): converts object to recursive type list.
as_num() is an alias for as_dbl().
as_str() is an alias for as_chr().

See also typeof.

### Usage 
as_bool(x, ...)

as_int(x, ...)

as_dbl(x, ...)

as_num(x, ...)

as_chr(x, ...)

as_str(x, ...)

as_cplx(x, ...)

as_raw(x, ...)

as_list(x, ...)
### Arguments
x an R object.
... further arguments passed to or from other methods.
### Value The converted object.

### Examples ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library("broadcast") # matrix example ==== x <- matrix(sample(-1:28), ncol = 5) colnames(x) <- month.name[1:5] rownames(x) <- month.abb[1:6] names(x) <- c(letters[1:20], LETTERS[1:10]) print(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May Jan 16 17 26 10 15 Feb 24 -1 7 19 0 Mar 4 5 2 8 23 Apr 1 13 11 21 25 May 14 9 18 6 22 Jun 27 28 20 12 3 attr(,"names") [1] "a" "b" "c" "d" "e" "f" "g" "h" "i" "j" "k" "l" "m" "n" "o" "p" "q" "r" "s" [20] "t" "A" "B" "C" "D" "E" "F" "G" "H" "I" "J" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_bool(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May Jan TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE Feb TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE FALSE Mar TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE Apr TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE May TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE Jun TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE attr(,"names") [1] "a" "b" "c" "d" "e" "f" "g" "h" "i" "j" "k" "l" "m" "n" "o" "p" "q" "r" "s" [20] "t" "A" "B" "C" "D" "E" "F" "G" "H" "I" "J" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_int(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May Jan 16 17 26 10 15 Feb 24 -1 7 19 0 Mar 4 5 2 8 23 Apr 1 13 11 21 25 May 14 9 18 6 22 Jun 27 28 20 12 3 attr(,"names") [1] "a" "b" "c" "d" "e" "f" "g" "h" "i" "j" "k" "l" "m" "n" "o" "p" "q" "r" "s" [20] "t" "A" "B" "C" "D" "E" "F" "G" "H" "I" "J" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_dbl(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May Jan 16 17 26 10 15 Feb 24 -1 7 19 0 Mar 4 5 2 8 23 Apr 1 13 11 21 25 May 14 9 18 6 22 Jun 27 28 20 12 3 attr(,"names") [1] "a" "b" "c" "d" "e" "f" "g" "h" "i" "j" "k" "l" "m" "n" "o" "p" "q" "r" "s" [20] "t" "A" "B" "C" "D" "E" "F" "G" "H" "I" "J" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_chr(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May Jan "16" "17" "26" "10" "15" Feb "24" "-1" "7" "19" "0" Mar "4" "5" "2" "8" "23" Apr "1" "13" "11" "21" "25" May "14" "9" "18" "6" "22" Jun "27" "28" "20" "12" "3" attr(,"names") [1] "a" "b" "c" "d" "e" "f" "g" "h" "i" "j" "k" "l" "m" "n" "o" "p" "q" "r" "s" [20] "t" "A" "B" "C" "D" "E" "F" "G" "H" "I" "J" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_cplx(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May Jan 16+0i 17+0i 26+0i 10+0i 15+0i Feb 24+0i -1+0i 7+0i 19+0i 0+0i Mar 4+0i 5+0i 2+0i 8+0i 23+0i Apr 1+0i 13+0i 11+0i 21+0i 25+0i May 14+0i 9+0i 18+0i 6+0i 22+0i Jun 27+0i 28+0i 20+0i 12+0i 3+0i attr(,"names") [1] "a" "b" "c" "d" "e" "f" "g" "h" "i" "j" "k" "l" "m" "n" "o" "p" "q" "r" "s" [20] "t" "A" "B" "C" "D" "E" "F" "G" "H" "I" "J" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_raw(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May Jan 10 11 1a 0a 0f Feb 18 00 07 13 00 Mar 04 05 02 08 17 Apr 01 0d 0b 15 19 May 0e 09 12 06 16 Jun 1b 1c 14 0c 03 attr(,"names") [1] "a" "b" "c" "d" "e" "f" "g" "h" "i" "j" "k" "l" "m" "n" "o" "p" "q" "r" "s" [20] "t" "A" "B" "C" "D" "E" "F" "G" "H" "I" "J" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} ################################################################################ # factor example ==== x <- factor(month.abb, levels = month.abb) names(x) <- month.name print(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May June July August Jan Feb Mar Apr May Jun Jul Aug September October November December Sep Oct Nov Dec Levels: Jan Feb Mar Apr May Jun Jul Aug Sep Oct Nov Dec ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_bool(as_int(x) > 6) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May June July August FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE TRUE TRUE September October November December TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_int(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May June July August 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 September October November December 9 10 11 12 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_dbl(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May June July August 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 September October November December 9 10 11 12 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_chr(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May June July August "Jan" "Feb" "Mar" "Apr" "May" "Jun" "Jul" "Aug" September October November December "Sep" "Oct" "Nov" "Dec" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_cplx(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May June July August 1+0i 2+0i 3+0i 4+0i 5+0i 6+0i 7+0i 8+0i September October November December 9+0i 10+0i 11+0i 12+0i ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_raw(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May June July August 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 September October November December 09 0a 0b 0c ``` ::: :::
